day1.title: Opening (and the Scav List)
day1.contactPerson: Arjun Maneesh Agarwal, Harshitha Mucherla, Vighnesh Sangle
day1.description: A rather unnecessary opening ceremony. Although, if you bear with it, you can get the scav list earlier than others.

day1.title: Tug of War I
day1.description: We've got a football field, a strong rope, and people who think they are strong. You do the math.

day1.title: FIFA Tournament
day1.contactPerson: Naman Maheshwari, Tejas Sah, Kabir Singh, Neelabh Shome
day1.description: 1 v 1 FIFA in complete E-Sports fashion. Also, there is silly commentary by {secret person}. No playoffs will clash with Tug of War

day1.title: Chess Clock Jenga
day1.description: The game of dexterity (and hoping that it doesn't fall) along with a chess clock to put pressure.

day1.title: Badminton Tournament
day1.description: Grab a partner and smash/slice your way to the top.

day1.title: Poetry Slam
day1.description: Spill your heart out and read your verses!

day1.title: Convention DnD
day1.description: Ever wanted to try out DnD (or other TTRPGs)? This is your opportunity. There are DMs, adventures and pre-gens; all we need is your imagination.

day1.title: Poker Night
day1.description: Don't play the odds, play the man!

day2.title: Presentation Night
day2.description: Educate or entertain us with armed only with a presentation. No MATH, CS or PHYSICS allowed.

day2.title: Balloon Battle Royale
day2.description: You've got a balloon on your back. All you have is a toothpick and your team's honour. THIS IS SPARTAAAAA

day2.title: Relay II
day2.description: Just the finals of a classic relay race

day2.title: Cultural Night
day2.description: CMI kids let loose and show their hidden talents. Singing, Instruments, Dance, Drama among other talents.

day2.title: Anti-Thesis
day2.description: You will be given a random dissertation of a topic you know nothing about. Now go defend it!

day3.title: Clash Royale
day3.description: Build your decks and fireball (or skelly swarm or zap or knight) your opponents! (no rounds clash with GeoGuesser)

day3.title: GeoGuesser
day3.description: Time to show how well traveled, well read or plain good at stalking you are in competitive GeoGuesser. (no rounds clash with Clash Royale)

day3.title: Murder Mystery Night
day3.description: Everyone gets a character and then someone dies. One of you put the body there and none of you can leave till we know who.

day3.title: Tug of War II
day3.description: We've got a football field, a strong rope, and people who are strong. Let's see who wins?

day3.title: Integration Bee I
day3.contactPerson: Arjun Maneesh Agarwal, Piyush Kumar Jha
day3.description: Are you ready to put your calculus skills to the test? Join us for a buzzing good time filled with integrals, fun, and prizes

day3.title: DJ Night
day3.description: One of CMI's only traditions. Get ready to dance, rave and overall not feel the legs next morning.

day4.title: 5 Minute Presentations
day4.description: You have 5 minutes to teach a topic while being judged by 3 CMI Profs. There are a lot of prizes.

day4.title: Jane Street's Estimathon
day4.description: 30 mins, 13 questions, 3 team mates. It is math brawl meets interview type problems. Also, we have Jane Street T-Shirts.

day4.title: Integration Bee II
day4.contactPerson: Arjun Maneesh Agarwal, Piyush Kumar Jha
day4.description: Master Integrators duke it out for the Grand Integrator Santa Cap (among other awards).

day4.title: Neel's Movie Club Pirated Film Festival
day4.description: The disposed  dictator of the movie club presents a bunch of short films (w|h)e really liked. The movies were obtained by completely legal means and piracy is just us being edgy.

day4.title: CMI vs IMSc Football
day4.description: A completely friendly match between sister institutes. Not that it will stop us from whooping their *&%'s.

day4.title: Quiz Night
day4.contactPerson: Arjun Maneesh Agarwal, Animikha Dutta Dhar
day4.description: Test your knowledge about our world, media, sports and everything else in teams of 3 in a pub quiz.

day4.title: Judgement Day
day4.description: The judges look at what the hunters have found, tally the scores and crown the champion.

day4.title: Closing Ceremony
day4.description: Another unnecessary event by the organizers.
